are using the Planned Parenthood video as a rallying cry.  Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) said this week that the video helps make the case for his bill that would strip Planned Parenthood of federal funding.  Every American should be shocked that an employee of the largest recipient of federal funds under Title X has been recorded aiding and abetting underage sex trafficking,  he said.  Mike Pence  is also participating in a webcast Thursday night with almost a dozen anti-abortion rights groups to build support for his measure. Mike Pence  announcement expected today, not tomorrow POLITICO has learned:   Mike Pence  is expected to announce late Thursday whether he is running for president, POLITICO has learned.  The announcement will appear first in the Indianapolis Star, an aide said.  Mike Pence  has been deliberating over his political future, stepping down from House Republican leadership as he mulls whether to run for president

The Republican elites were then terrified of Reagan, considering him the proponent of "voodoo economics,""  too extreme to win.
